thread.title: Deepika Padukone Leaves For Worldwide Release Of xXx: Return of Xander Cage

author: Koimoi.com Team
title: Deepika Padukone Leaves For Worldwide Release Of xXx: Return of Xander Cage
text: tweet Indian actress Deepika Padukone and Hollywood star Vin Diesel recently attended the grand premiere of their forthcoming Hollywood action film “ xXx: The   ” here. Now, Deepika is set for its worldwide promotion and screening. Deepika was spotted at the airport here on Friday night. She said: “I haven’t had the time to talk to anyone who has seen the film. I am happy for whoever came, they came to support and encourage. “We are so happy with the turnout of the media, and all our fans have been so amazing in these two days. Vin just left a while ago and he was so happy and overwhelmed by everything that India had to offer.” Deepika leaves for worldwide release of her Hollywood film The premiere of the film took place on Thursday, and was attended by her fraternity members, friends, family and fans. Some of the Bollywood celebrities wished and congratulated Deepika for her achievement. Stars like Ranveer Singh, Shahid Kapoor, Kriti Sanon, Irrfan Khan, Shabana Azmi and Karan Johar attended the special premiere. An after-party was organised as well. The film’s team has left for the US for its worldwide premiere, which will happen on January 20. SHARE
